materials.raw_text: B: 60 g (Boron), Be: 30 g (Beryllium), Ru: 120 g (Ruthenium), Tm: 40 g (Thulium)

sourcing.instructions: B: Purchase from a chemical supply company or online chemical retailer. Be: Obtain from a specialized metals supplier or online. Ru: Source from a precious metals dealer or online supplier. Tm: Acquire from a rare earth metals distributor or online.
steps: B: Purchase from a chemical supply company or online chemical retailer. Be: Obtain from a specialized metals supplier or online. Ru: Source from a precious metals dealer or online supplier. Tm: Acquire from a rare earth metals distributor or online.

1. Weigh each ingredient accurately using a digital scale. 2. In a clean, dry container, mix the B and Be powders thoroughly to ensure uniformity. 3. Gradually add the Ru powder to the B-Be mixture while stirring continuously. 4. Finally, incorporate the Tm powder into the blend, ensuring an even distribution. 5. Use a mortar and pestle to grind the mixture further, if necessary, to achieve a fine powder consistency.
preparation.raw_text: 1. Weigh each ingredient accurately using a digital scale. 2. In a clean, dry container, mix the B and Be powders thoroughly to ensure uniformity. 3. Gradually add the Ru powder to the B-Be mixture while stirring continuously. 4. Finally, incorporate the Tm powder into the blend, ensuring an even distribution. 5. Use a mortar and pestle to grind the mixture further, if necessary, to achieve a fine powder consistency.

steps: 1. Transfer the mixed powder into a high-temperature resistant crucible. 2. Place the crucible in a furnace and set the temperature to 1,200 째C. 3. Maintain this temperature for 2 hours to ensure complete synthesis of the compound.
heating.raw_text: 1. Transfer the mixed powder into a high-temperature resistant crucible. 2. Place the crucible in a furnace and set the temperature to 1,200 째C. 3. Maintain this temperature for 2 hours to ensure complete synthesis of the compound.

steps: 1. After the heating duration, turn off the furnace and allow it to cool down naturally to room temperature. 2. Avoid opening the furnace until it has cooled below 300 째C to prevent thermal shock.
cooling.raw_text: 1. After the heating duration, turn off the furnace and allow it to cool down naturally to room temperature. 2. Avoid opening the furnace until it has cooled below 300 째C to prevent thermal shock.

steps: 1. Once cooled, remove the solidified sample from the crucible. 2. Using a diamond saw, cut the sample to the desired dimensions of 3 inches x 2 inches x 7 inches. 3. Sand the edges with fine-grit sandpaper to smooth any rough surfaces. 4. Optionally, apply a protective sealant to enhance durability.
post_processing.raw_text: 1. Once cooled, remove the solidified sample from the crucible. 2. Using a diamond saw, cut the sample to the desired dimensions of 3 inches x 2 inches x 7 inches. 3. Sand the edges with fine-grit sandpaper to smooth any rough surfaces. 4. Optionally, apply a protective sealant to enhance durability.
